LanguageData.MolecularNutrientResequencing.label: [ZH-TW] Molecular Nutrient Resequencing
LanguageData.MolecularNutrientResequencing.descriptio: [ZH-TW] Allows the construction of Replimat systems, advanced versions of nutrient paste dispensers that convert raw nutritive feedstock into a wider variety of high quality meals. Also automatically lays nutrient feedstock pipelines along existing power conduit networks.
